description:
President Dekapan just wants to push the button, Iyami show off his ventriloquist skills, and the brothers deal with Valentine’s Day.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dekapan-daitouryou / Fukuwajutsu / Valentine Day / Delivery Konto: Hontou wa Hanashi ga Susumanai Shirayukihime
President Dekapan / Ventriloquism / Valentine`s Day / Delivery Skit: The Story of Snow White That Doesn`t Actually Get Anywhere
デカパン大統領 / ふくわ術 / バレンタインデー / デリバリーコント 本当は話が進まない白雪姫
